In this blogpost, I share some of the top **ML and AI** resources for bioinformatics. If you are keen to learn about machine learning and AI, this is the post for you!

So if you are ready... let's dive in!

<hr class="section-divider">


Here are some resources to get you started in your ML and AI journey! If you've completed any of these courses and would like to share your experience, leave me a comment in the comments section below! 


### Foundational ML Courses

<ul>
<li>[**Machine Learning Specialization**](https://www.coursera.org/specializations/machine-learning-introduction) by Andrew Ng (Coursera) – The best introduction to ML fundamentals. Start here if you're new to machine learning.</li>
<li>[**Fast.ai Practical Deep Learning for Coders**](https://course.fast.ai/) – Top-down approach to learning deep learning. Free, practical, and code-first.</li>
<li>[**Stanford CS229: Machine Learning**](https://cs229.stanford.edu/) – Comprehensive course materials and lecture notes available free online.</li>
<li>[**MIT 6.S191: Introduction to Deep Learning**](http://introtodeeplearning.com/) – Excellent lectures covering modern deep learning with accessible explanations.</li>
</ul>

### Biology-Specific ML Resources

<ul>
<li>[**Deep Learning for the Life Sciences**](https://www.deeplearninglifesciences.com/) by Ramsundar et al. – Specifically designed for applying deep learning to biological problems. Code examples included.</li>
<li>[**Machine Learning for Bioinformatics**](https://www.biostat.wisc.edu/~craven/cs760/) (UW-Madison) – Course materials covering ML applications in genomics and proteomics.</li>
<li>[**Molecular Machine Learning**](https://github.com/ur-whitelab/mol-ml) – Interactive textbook for applying ML to molecular and chemical data.</li>
<li>[**ML for Healthcare**](https://mlhealthcare.github.io/) (MIT) – Focuses on clinical and health data applications.</li>
</ul>

### Books and Textbooks

<ul>
<li>[**Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras & TensorFlow**](https://www.oreilly.com/library/view/hands-on-machine-learning/9781492032632/) by Aurélien Géron – Practical ML implementation guide with clear examples.</li>
<li>[**Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/publication/pattern-recognition-machine-learning/) by Christopher Bishop – Comprehensive mathematical treatment. Free PDF available.</li>
<li>[**Deep Learning**](https://www.deeplearningbook.org/) by Goodfellow, Bengio, and Courville – The definitive deep learning textbook. Free online.</li>
<li>[**An Introduction to Statistical Learning (ISLR)**](https://www.statlearning.com/) – Essential bridge between statistics and ML with R code.</li>
</ul>

### Python Libraries and Tools

<ul>
<li>[**Scikit-learn Documentation**](https://scikit-learn.org/stable/) – The go-to library for classical ML in Python. Excellent tutorials and examples.</li>
<li>[**PyTorch Tutorials**](https://pytorch.org/tutorials/) – Modern deep learning framework with great documentation.</li>
<li>[**TensorFlow and Keras Guides**](https://www.tensorflow.org/guide) – Comprehensive guides for building neural networks.</li>
<li>[**Biopython ML Tools**](https://biopython.org/) – Python tools specifically for computational biology.</li>
</ul>

### Specialized Topics

<ul>
<li>[**StatQuest Neural Networks Playlist**](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLblh5JKOoLUIxGDQs4LFFD--41Vzf-ME1) – Josh Starmer's clear explanations of neural networks and deep learning concepts.</li>
<li>[**3Blue1Brown Neural Networks Series**](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZHQObOWTQDNU6R1_67000Dx_ZCJB-3pi) – Beautiful visual intuition for how neural networks work.</li>
<li>[**Genomic Deep Learning**](https://github.com/gifford-lab/GEM) – Tools and tutorials for applying deep learning to genomic sequences.</li>
<li>[**AlphaFold Resources**](https://github.com/deepmind/alphafold) – Learn from DeepMind's protein structure prediction breakthrough.</li>
</ul>

### Practical Notebooks and Tutorials

<ul>
<li>[**Google Colab ML Tutorials**](https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/welcome.ipynb) – Free GPU access and pre-made notebooks for ML experimentation.</li>
<li>[**Kaggle Learn**](https://www.kaggle.com/learn) – Interactive ML courses with hands-on coding exercises.</li>
<li>[**Papers with Code**](https://paperswithcode.com/) – Research papers with implementation code, great for staying current.</li>
<li>[**Hugging Face Course**](https://huggingface.co/learn/nlp-course/chapter1/1) – Modern NLP and transformer models, applicable to biological sequences.</li>
</ul>

### Communities and Updates

<ul>
<li>[**r/bioinformatics**](https://www.reddit.com/r/bioinformatics/) – Active community discussing ML applications in biology.</li>
<li>[**Towards Data Science**](https://towardsdatascience.com/) – Medium publication with practical ML tutorials and case studies.</li>
<li>[**distill.pub**](https://distill.pub/) – Beautiful, interactive explanations of ML concepts.</li>
</ul>
